TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供關於 ASP.NET 驗證失敗的資訊。

span.span: Provides information about ASP.NET authentication failures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列清單說明的功能，根據預設，ASP.NET 會引發事件。The following list describes the features for which events are raised by default by ASP.NET. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 設定的預設記錄稽核失敗的狀況，因為記錄成功情況可以嚴重耗用系統資源。By default ASP.NET is configured to log audit failure conditions only, as logging success conditions can severely strain system resources. 您永遠可以設定系統以記錄成功的情況。You can always configure the system to log the success conditions. - 表單驗證。Forms Authentication. 雖然成功稽核包含已驗證的使用者名稱失敗的稽核不包含使用者名稱，因為它們通常會產生從無法解密或驗證票證。While success audits include the user name that was authenticated; failure audits do not include the user name, since they typically result from a ticket that failed decryption or validation. 同時包含用戶端 IP 位址。Both contain the client IP address. 相關的事件的稽核程式碼是。The related event audit code is . - 成員資格。Membership. 成功及失敗稽核會包含所嘗試的使用者名稱。Both success and failure audits contain the username that was attempted. 兩種稽核會包含已嘗試的密碼，因為，會有風險保存記錄檔中有效的密碼。Neither form of audit will contain the password that was attempted, because that would risk persisting a valid password in the log. 相關的事件的稽核程式碼是。The related event audit code is . 當引發時，依預設它會更新的驗證事件引發的稽核失敗的效能計數器。When a is raised, by default it updates the Audit Authentication Failure Events Raised performance counter. 若要檢視中的 系統監視器 (PerfMon)，此效能計數器**新增計數器**視窗中選取`ASP.NET`中**效能**物件下拉式清單中，選取**驗證失敗的事件引發**效能計數器，然後按一下 **新增** 按鈕。To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select `ASP.NET` in the **Performance** object drop-down list, select the **Authentication Failure Events Raised** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 應用程式中使用 「 系統監視器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) MSDN 上。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) on MSDN. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，您會指定中的值，以便控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視的型別，來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例的衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式，若是衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂此建構函式。The following code example shows how to customize this constructor. summary.span: 取得要驗證的使用者名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the user to authenticate.
The name of the user to authenticate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有成功稽核應該包含已驗證的使用者的名稱。Only the success audits should include the name of the authenticated user. 失敗稽核應該不會包含使用者名稱，因為它們通常是由解密或驗證失敗所造成。The failure audits should not include the user name, since they typically result from failed decryption or validation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example shows how to use property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent/CS/WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent/VB/WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent.vb#3)]
